summary: Nothing less than a phenomenal, astonishing and pioneering film. This spectacle of an angry, ego-driven youth tormented by his own emotional impotence, low self-esteem and resentment towards his parents.
cast: Hiroshi Kawaguchi|Keizô Kawasaki|Seiji Miyaguchi|Ayako Wakao|Teruko Kishi|Nobuo Nakamura|Yosuke Irie|Masayoshi Umewaka|Masaya Tsukida|Toshio Harumoto|Kôichi Itô|Osamu Maruyama|Nobuo Minamitaka|Shizuo Chûjô|Eniko Seto|Kôji Minami|Tsutomu Nakata|Tetsurô Takeuchi|Hiroshi Otsuka|Naoyasu Itô|Mitsuhiko Kurosu|Shiroyuki Miyajima|Kisao Tobita|Shigeo Shimada|Takashi Kotaka|Mamoru Hirata|Naoe Yamazaki|Kimio Shimazaki|Hideo Matsuzawa|Masamitsu Takahashi|Kazuo Kawami|Fumio Nakae|Motoomi Fukurono|Yôko Mikawa|Kyôko Shirokawa|Wakayo Matsumura|Miwako Miyado|Ayako Sugimoto|Takako Hayama|Sachiko Ikehara|Mineko Higuchi|Hideko Takano
title: Shokei no heya
